sentences.en: ...grey eyes that seemed filled with pain.
sentences.cn: …似乎充满了痛苦的灰色眼睛。

sentences.en: All Corfield got for his pains was a bullet in the head.
sentences.cn: 科菲尔德千辛万苦，到头来却被一枪爆头。

sentences.en: Eucalyptus oil is good for easing muscular aches and pains.
sentences.cn: 桉树油可以很好地缓解肌肉的疼痛.

sentences.en: He went to great pains to show how horrifying the war was.
sentences.cn: 他极力指出战争是多么的恐怖.

sentences.en: I flatter myself that I have spared no pains.
sentences.cn: 我自问是花过不少力气的.

sentences.en: I had taken great pains with my appearance.
sentences.cn: 我在自己的容貌上下了很多工夫。

sentences.en: I thought the pains meant I was going into labour.
sentences.cn: 我还以为这些疼痛意味着我要生了呢。

sentences.en: It pains me to have to leave, but I must.
sentences.cn: 不得不离开使我感到痛苦, 但我必须离开.

sentences.en: It'seems to me you're going to be a fool for your pains.
sentences.cn: 我看你是要做个徒劳无功的傻瓜.

sentences.en: Mary took great pains with her English lessons and got high marks.
sentences.cn: 玛丽在英语课方面下很大的工夫,因而考了高分.

sentences.en: She asked after the aches and pains of all the old people.
sentences.cn: 她询问了所有老人的各种病痛.

sentences.en: She experienced an increase in generalized aches and pains.
She had aches and pains all over after the four - day trip.
sentences.cn: 四天的旅行后她感到浑身上下十分疼痛.

sentences.en: The disease typically manifests itself in a high fever and chest pains.
sentences.cn: 这种疾病的典型症状是发高烧和胸痛.

sentences.en: The doctor was associated in the child's mind with injections and pains.
sentences.cn: 在孩子的心里,医生总是使他联想到打针与疼痛.

sentences.en: They both suffered from crippling pains in their hips.
sentences.cn: 他们俩都感到髋部疼痛难忍。

words.tran_cn: 使痛苦（pain的第三人称单数形式）

phrases.tran_cn: [医]发育期痛；青少年发育期的关节痛

trans.tran_cn: 麻烦，辛苦，痛苦( pain的名词复数 )，劳苦，令人厌烦的人[事物]，身体某部分的疼痛[不适]
trans.tran_en: Pain is the feeling of unhappiness that you have when something unpleasant or upsetting happens
